instructions: place the dinner fork on the left side of the table cloth with the prongs facing upwards
place the knife on the right side of the table cloth with the blade facing the fork
place the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork with the prongs facing upward
place the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife with the blade facing the left side
place the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife with the bowl facing upward
place the dessert spoon at the top of the table cloth with the bowl horizontally facing the forks
place the dessert spoon to the right of the soup spoon with the bowl facing upward
place the dessert spoon at the top of the table cloth with the bowl horizontally facing the forks
place the dinner plate in between the forks and knives
place the bread plate above the forks
place the butter knife on top of the bread plate with the blade facing the forks
place the wine glass above the soup spoon
place the water glass above the dinner knife
place the napkin on top of the dinner plate
